Module it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034
Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP034.model

Interface IStateManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
Apollo, Artemis, Athena, Atlas, Demeter, GodsRules, Hephaestus, Hera, Hestia, Limus, Minotaur, Pan, Prometheus, Triton, Zeus
public interface IStateManager
Interface containing the methods used to arrange proper game actions (such as move, build, power, victory).

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean executeState​(TurnPhase currentPhase, Worker worker, Tile tile, boolean choice)
    Executes and manages the current phase actions.
    NextStateInfo nextState​(TurnPhase currentPhase)
    Sets the right next phase, given the current phase.

  • Method Details

    • nextState

      NextStateInfo nextState​(TurnPhase currentPhase)
      Sets the right next phase, given the current phase.
      Parameters:
      currentPhase - Actual phase at the given moment.
      Returns:
      Encapsulated info containing next phase and required actions.

    • executeState

      boolean executeState​(TurnPhase currentPhase, Worker worker, Tile tile, boolean choice)
      Executes and manages the current phase actions.
      Parameters:
      currentPhase - Actual phase at the given moment.
      worker - Worker who performs actions during the current phase.
      tile - Tile destination of an action.
      choice - Boolean that sets the possible power choice.
      Returns:
      true if the current phase is executed normally, false if there are problems that prevent the normal execution to complete.
